menu.name: Cheeseburger
menu.description: Melted cheese on top of the meat patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and pickles in a bun.

menu.name: Eggplant Parmesan
menu.description: Layers of pan-fried or baked eggplant, tomato sauce, and melted mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.

menu.name: Lentil Soup
menu.description: Protein-rich dish made primarily with lentils and a flavorful broth, with vegetables like carrots, celery, and onions

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Layers of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, alternating with a whipped mixture of mascarpone cheese, eggs, and sugar, and finished with a dusting of cocoa powder
